messages.subject: Victorian Sword Ban update
messages.msgSnippet: All, I received today the latest on the Victorian Sword Ban drama. There is a fair bit of information to read so I put it into an HTML file and uploaded it to
messages.messageBody:
All, I received today the latest on the Victorian Sword Ban drama. There is a fair bit of information to read so I put it into an HTML file and uploaded it to my site. Take a look, there is some interesting stuff there.

Cheers all

Rich

http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/Docs/sword_Ban_Update.htm

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
